page.shortlink: ux controlbar items clipping rectangle fill property
page.description: Defines how the disclosure filles the clipping rectangle.

discussion.p: When the disclosure *[ui:Display type]* is set to 'explicit', a clipping rectangle must be defined. The clipping rectangle defines where and how the disclosure is shown. The *[ui:Fill]* property defines how the disclosure fills the clipping rectangle when it is animated into view. There are three options for the Fill behavior:

item.name: width
item.description: Disclosure expands to fill the width of the clipping rectangle. The height is determined by the height of the content.

item.name: height
item.description: The disclosure expands to fill the ehight of the clipping rectangle. The width is determined by the content.

item.name: both
item.description: The disclosure's width and height is the same as the width and height of the clipping rectangle.
